thread.section_title: OneSimCard Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OneSimCard | www.onesimcard.com
thread.title: Yoav Chudnoff

author: Yoav Chudnoff
title: Yoav Chudnoff
text:
This has been the only one sim card that I have been using when travelling abroad. Not only is the pricing one of the best out there, it also provides an option for VOIP cutting costs even more when making calls. This is especially great if you only have one sim card slot in the phone and can use the app to make and receive calls.
Programmes, such as recommend a friend also makes it even more cost effective.
I like the fact that inbound calls and text messages are not charged (at least when I am travelling to countries in which have an agreement).
I would highly recommend this card. Great programme and great backend support.
